title: Dairy and gluten free 'buttermilk' pancakes
ingredients: ['160g sweet rice flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs, beaten', '300ml soya yoghurt', '60ml rice milk', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil']
